jdbcService.sql: select distinct u.id, u.created, u.modified, u.password, u.salt, u.password_modified, u.alias, u.verification_code, u.invites_left, u.blocked_since, u.anonymous, u.realm from users u join user_groups ug on ug.user_id = u.id join groups g on g.id = ug.group_id where g.owner_id = :ownerId and (:groups is null or g.name = any(:groups))
